attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Congestion and "Vehicle Carbon Emissions" are huge problems for us all. Road charging will effectively clear the roads of people that drive simply because it is convienient. This will clearly solve the congestion problem, and help to slow the onset of global warming. Please ensure that this revenue is used wisely on improving the public transport network !

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Carry on with Road Charging."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11460.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ForRoadCharging/

Environment Secretary Hilary Benn has written a message exclusively for people who recently signed petitions on the No10 website about climate change.

Mr Benn highlights the UK Government's commitment to seeking international agreement on a post-2012 climate change framework, and encourages petitioners, their families, and friends, to use the new CO2 Calculator.

Read the message here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13496.asp


Prime Minister's Office
